roleDiscription:
Responsible for functional design solutions creating better product experiences. The broad responsibility of a UX designer is to ensure that the product logically flows from one step to the next. 

Roles & Responsibilities:
Gather information about users and step into their shoes by developing empathy and understanding.
Understand the business requirements and overall goals of a project.
Develop a flow, a plan, and break down the various user journeys that are required to achieve the best possible experience.
Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders and internal teams to help them understand design concepts.
Have a good eye for detail and always try to simplify a user’s experience.


Skills:
Understanding of UX principles and methodologies.
Ability to take feedback and design inputs.
Skilled at rapid prototyping, UX research, developing wireframes, creating product mock-ups, analyzing business processes.
Understanding of Web and mobile Ux best practices
Experience in prototyping -  Figma
Degree in any Design discipline (Interaction Design preferred)

A creative individual is responsible for creating the aesthetic look and feel of a
product by using standard design principles and practices.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Establish the visual identity of a project and create interfaces/screens as per the requirements.
Setup or work within a UI guideline which will ensure the uniformity and standardization of a brand’s vision and style.
Design reusable UI components, graphics, icons, infographics, and logos.
Collaborate with stakeholders and UX designers to understand the flow and needs of a user.
Work closely with developers and inspect the quality of the designs.

Skills:
Good knowledge of colors, typography, visual aesthetics, layout, and white space.
Experience with software like Adobe XD, Sketch, and Figma.
Ability to develop new and fresh UI keeping simplicity a priority.
Handle and reflect on design feedback.
Bring identity to every design work.
A strong design portfolio showcasing your design skills

UI Engineer who can take the designer’s pixels to codes using the latest UI programming languages. We are looking for candidates who believe in design and are ready to adapt to the latest UI technologies and standards.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.
Determining the structure and design of web pages.
Ensuring user experience determines design choices.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Developing features to enhance the user experience.
Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones, tablets, laptops, PCs, etc.
Building reusable code and libraries for future use.
Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design.
Skills:
A Frontend Developer, excellent in HTML5, CSS3, Responsive design, JavaScript and Bootstrap framework, 
Component-based development using popular Javascript frameworks like React JS, Angular JS etc
Comfortable both working within an existing code base and writing code from scratch.
Excellent problem solving, design, and debugging skills.

An experienced person who can take the lead of managing a design team while 
maintaining the project’s requirements.

Roles and Responsibilities:
Understand the project and business goals to plan the strategy to achieve the desired result.
Drive the entire project from initial design stages to final delivery.
Set up meetings with clients to ensure smooth to and fro on the delivery of the project. 
Develop quick wireframes and prototypes and collaborate with other designers and stakeholders. 
Have track of the progress and asset files of every project.

Skills:
Proven experience in managing design projects.
Expert in standard design practices, methodologies, and user thinking.
Have a good eye for design and details. 
Good communication and presentation skills

You will be working as a part of the Digital Marketing & Campaign team focusing on planning, executing, tracking and analysis of direct marketing campaigns. This team will be responsible for the entire lifecycle of a marketing campaign, from inception to launch to the evaluation of results.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Drive more visitors to the corporate brand website using various content marketing strategies
Write blog articles to drive traffic to the website.
Generate leads using various social channels, industry research etc.
Prepare pitch decks for various services that we offer.
Design, build and maintain our social media presence.
Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
Utilize the strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touchpoints.

Skills:
Proven experience in leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns.
Good knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends)
Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
Ability to include a fun/quirky factor in any type of marketing campaign to grab the attention of a customer/user.

Responsible for functional design solutions creating better product experiences. The broad responsibility of a UX Intern is to assist senior designers and ensure that the product logically flows from one step to the next. 

Roles & Responsibilities:
Gather information about users and step into their shoes by developing empathy and understanding.
Understand the business requirements and overall goals of a project.
Develop a flow, a plan, and break down the various user journeys that are required to achieve the best possible experience.
Communicate with stakeholders and internal teams to help them understand design concepts.
Have a good eye for detail and always try to simplify a user’s experience.
Should be available for minimum 6 Months


Skills:
Understanding of design principles and methodologies.
Ability to take feedback and design inputs.
Skilled with figma.
Understanding of Web and mobile Ux best practices.
Bachelor's Degree

UI Engineer who can take the designer’s pixels to codes using the latest UI programming languages. We are looking for candidates who believe in design and are ready to adapt to the latest UI technologies and standards.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.
Determining the structure and design of web pages.
Ensuring user experience determines design choices.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Developing features to enhance the user experience.
Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones, tablets, laptops, PCs, etc.
Building reusable code and libraries for future use.
Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design.
Skills:
A Frontend Developer, excellent in HTML5, CSS3, Responsive design, JavaScript and Bootstrap framework, 
Component-based development using popular Javascript frameworks like React JS, Angular JS etc
Comfortable both working within an existing code base and writing code from scratch.
Excellent problem solving, design, and debugging skills.

Responsible for functional design solutions creating better product experiences. The broad responsibility of a UX Manager is to ensure that the product logically flows from one step to the next. 

Roles & Responsibilities:

Gather information about users and step into their shoes by developing empathy and understanding.
Develop the strategic plans for the UX team.
Lead and mentor direct reports, make hiring decisions for the team, and help individuals improve by providing feedback on research and design work.
Share your design expertise across the organization
Understand the business requirements and overall goals of a project.
Develop a flow, a plan, and break down the various user journeys that are required to achieve the best possible experience.
Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders and internal teams to help them understand design concepts.
Have a good eye for detail and always try to simplify a user’s experience.
Build and maintain team values and a positive team culture
Manage projects and deadlines for the team
Prioritize and assign work to the team while ensuring deadlines are met and manageable.

Skills:
Understanding of UX principles and methodologies.
Ability to take feedback and design inputs.
Understanding of Web and mobile Ux best practices.
Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar.
Experience with B2B & B2C project design delivery experience
Experience with handling International Clients presales to delivery
Be an expert on all aspects of UX research and design including:
Information architecture: Organizing pages and information within a website or app so that it is navigable and accessible
Prototypes: Building simplified versions of a working feature or product to investigate problems and validate solutions
Research: Collecting and analyzing inputs such as behavioral data and customer feedback
Testing: Examining whether solutions are working as intended
Visual design: Understanding how elements like colors, font, images, and layout impact user experience
Wireframes: Designing blueprints that demonstrate how a solution works before displaying how it will look
Degree in any Design discipline (Interaction Design preferred)

Guide and mentor the UX & UI team members, provide feedback, and ensure that the output is delivered with good quality
Work with visual designers and engineering teams. Lead/Facilitate learning and coach a team of UI/ UX Designers.
Run Design standups, capable of handling multiple projects simultaneously creating user-centric designs based on customer feedback and usability findings.
Understand user perspectives by actively listening, observing, communicating, and limiting assumptions.
Apply design thinking principles to empathize with users, document findings from the user interviews, work with the project team to formulate good user journeys, and prepare wireframes based on the above considerations to ensure that user needs are captured, and validated with customers and that the expectations are communicated well to the project team.
Conduct research using different methods (qualitative, quantitative, behavioral, in-person user research, etc.) to understand more about the customer, and identify the key users of the system 
Prepare questionnaires, run workshops, and conduct interviews with customers & key stakeholders, to understand both stated and unstated needs, challenges, and preferences on how they intend to interact with the system.
Work with the stakeholders and the team to plan and prioritize the product backlog, ensure that the product backlog is well defined, and that requirements meet the Definition of Ready (DoR) before they are considered for development.
Validate and test features to ensure that user requirements are met before they are demonstrated or delivered to the customer.
Attend/facilitate pre-sales calls.
Develop visual style and quality bar of the UI by creating appealing and high-quality app interfaces to present a unique clear visual identity across multiple platforms including web, iOS, and Android.
Design detailed wireframes with clear user journeys, information architecture, interaction flow, and interaction models, user flow/process flows.
Low and high-fidelity design mock-ups to effectively conceptualize and communicate high-level design strategies and detailed interaction behavior
Produce deliverables including presentations, graphic designs, wireframes, interactive prototypes, usability reports, design specs, etc.
Effectively sell design solutions to cross-functional teams and stakeholders through design storytelling and by demonstrating traceability in design thinking.
Participate in UX documentation & publish design-specific articles to the wider community.

Skills/Requirements:
Strong experience in designing and delivering complex, interactive, large-scale design projects.
Excellent problem-solving and design skills
Ability to interpret user problems within the context of the product/business and detailed findings into actionable design recommendations and solutions.
Ability to work  & guide multi-ethnic cross-functional teams as a  mentor
Good communication, presentation skills, and experience will help manage clients independently
A good understanding of Graphic & UX Design principles
Hands-on experience with the design process of software services or software products
Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) and methodologies
Familiar with the latest global design trends
Ux writing skills will have an added advantage
A bachelor in design will be preferred

Seeking a talented and self-motivated Graphic Design Intern to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about design, possess a keen eye for detail, and be proficient in various design and animation tools. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience and contribute to our digital and print marketing efforts.

Key Responsibilities

Graphic Design
Create visually appealing graphics for blogs, social media posts, newsletters, and event collaterals.

Video Production
Develop engaging videos and reels for social media platforms to enhance our online presence and audience engagement.

Collaboration
Work closely with the marketing and content teams to ensure designs align with brand guidelines and project requirements.

Timely Delivery
Manage multiple design projects simultaneously and deliver high-quality outputs within stipulated deadlines.

Innovation
Stay updated with the latest design trends and tools to continuously bring fresh and creative ideas.


Requirements

Design Sensitivity
Strong sense of aesthetics and attention to detail.

Software Proficiency
Well-versed in design software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma. Experience with video animations tools like Adobe After Effects is an added advantage.

Adaptability
Ability to work under guidelines and direction provided by the team.

Time Management
Strong organizational skills to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines.


Preferred Qualifications

Previous experience or internships in graphic design.
Portfolio showcasing a range of graphic design projects.
Knowledge of social media trends and best practices.


Why Join Us
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and creative environment.
Gain valuable hands-on experience in graphic design and video production.
Collaborate with a passionate and supportive team.
Contribute to exciting projects and initiatives.


If you are enthusiastic about design and eager to learn and grow, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and be a part of our creative journey!

Create and develop applications/systems based on wireframes and product requirement documents, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Lead both back-end and front-end development using technologies such as React.js,Node.js, MongoDB, Express, and Redux.
Write unit tests to ensure code robustness, covering edge cases, usability, and overall reliability.
Develop reusable, maintainable, and versioned code adhering to DRY principles.
Integrate existing tools and business systems, including in-house tools, to streamline operations.
Demonstrate proficiency in creating dynamic, responsive web pages.
Have a solid understanding of Server-Oriented Architecture and RESTful Web Services.
Mentor junior team members on system architecture, and coding practices, and encourage a culture of continuous improvement.

What Makes You a Great Fit:
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a deep understanding of data structures and algorithms.
Eagerness to Learn: A strong desire for responsibility and a thirst for knowledge, continuously seeking to expand your expertise.
Passion for Excellence: A passion for building robust, failure-resistant systems, with a commitment to maintaining high coding standards.
Quality Advocate: A proactive advocate for quality software, ensuring that issues are promptly identified and resolved.
API Integration: Experience with RESTful APIs to connect front-end components to back-end services.
Cloud Messaging & Deployment: Experience with cloud messaging APIs and push notifications, preferably Firebase, and proficiency in container-based application deployment using Docker or similar technologies.
Cloud Platforms: Familiarity with at least one cloud platform, such as AWS, GCP, Azure, or Digital Ocean. Experience with the GraphQL ecosystem is a plus.
Must-Have Skill Sets:
Proficiency in Fullstack, JavaScript, and  jQuery

Source potential leads through various channels, including online portals, databases, LinkedIn, and freelance platforms.
Develop a thorough understanding of the Company's products, services, and target audience.
Focus on generating high-quality leads, including those interested in demos, portfolios, detailed discussions, or direct conversions.
Conduct pre-sales calls to initiate conversations and assess lead potential.
Organize lead details (emails, phone numbers, LinkedIn profiles) for follow-up.
Contact leads to gather insights and assess interest while checking their availability for capacity demos.
Conduct follow-up calls for leads requesting later engagement.
Maintain accurate records of all lead activities in a Google document.
Provide daily and weekly reports on lead generation and conversion progress to the team.

Job Title: Junior Python Developer 

Experience: 1+ yrs
Employment Type: Full-Time
Education: B.Tech CS / IT or related

Key Responsibilities: 

Develop, debug, and maintain Python applications, scripts, and APIs.
Support the design and implementation of AI/ML models for predictive analytics, NLP, or computer vision.
Collaborate with the cross-functional team to integrate machine learning models into production systems.
Work with data preprocessing, cleaning, and feature engineering for ML workflows.
Write clean, efficient, and reusable code following best practices.
Contribute to documentation, code reviews, and knowledge sharing within the team.
Stay updated with emerging Python frameworks, AI/ML tools, and industry trends.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, Data Science, or related field.
Minimum 1 year of hands-on experience in Python development.
Strong understanding of Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.
Exposure in working with OpenAI, Lambda, etc 
Exposure to AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow / PyTorch / Keras.
Knowledge of NLP, deep learning, or computer vision techniques.
Familiarity with REST APIs, Flask/FastAPI, or Django.
Understanding of version control (Git) and collaborative development practices.
Strong problem-solving, analytical thinking, and eagerness to learn new technologies.
